author: tvolkert
msg: Fixed bug in Dispatcher when thread group is disposed (such as when an applet's page is refreshed)

author: tvolkert
msg: Changed Viewport and ScrollPaneSkin to allow "out of range" scrollTop and scrollLeft values (if set programatically).

author: tvolkert
msg: Changed ApplicationContext#getDisplayHost() to be public, but deprecated it to flag that it will be made protected again in a future release

author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Use thread local storage to allow ApplicationContext to call instance methods on current context instance.

author: tvolkert
msg: Made LinkButton only respond to left-button mouse clicks (as opposed to all mouse clicks)
